subject: Breakfast, team formation, and time to start hacking!
body:
Thank you to everyone who came out to our opening ceremony and a round of applause for our speaker Anakin Trotter!

The moment you’ve all been waiting for is here! It’s time to start hacking! We wish you all the best of luck and can’t wait to see what you come up with!

If you do not have a team, we will be hosting an official team formation event now next to the Connect-4 sets by the round tables!

Additionally, breakfast is from Noah’s Bagels and is being served at the back of the room. Get up and to it hackers!

Have fun and Happy hacking!

subject: Opening ceremony starts soon!
body:
Hello hackers! The beginning of Hack on the Hill is coming! 

We’re kicking things off at our OPENING CEREMONY in the Carnesale Commons Palisades Room! Excited to see everyone there and welcome you all to our 12-hour hackathon experience!

subject: Direct from Hack to HOTH
body: Hello! If you are joining the Hack server and are here for HOTH XII, please go to the #rules-and-roles-select channel, react to the Role Menu message with the HOTH XII logo to get the HOTH XI role. Then you can head to the #hoth-getting-started channel for more information!

subject: Welcome to HOTH XII!
body: Welcome to Hack on the Hill XII! We're glad to have you, and excited to see what you'll build. HOTH XII takes place this Sunday March 2nd, 2025. We'll be periodically updating these announcements with new information, so be sure to keep an eye out! Happy hacking! :)
